title: It's a Wonderful Life
description: In celebration of the 50th anniversary of Frank Capra's perennially favorite film, It's a Wonderful Life, here, for the first time, is the novel. Featuring all the characters from the movie, It's a Wonderful Life encourages readers to ask the question, "What would life have been like if we hadn't been born?" During one crisis-filled night, in the little town of Bedford Falls, George Bailey will discover the answer.
author: M.C. Bolin
